description: Discover if a career in technology aligns with your interests and skills

questions.text: Do you enjoy solving logical puzzles and complex problems?

choices.text: Very much - I love challenging problems
Sometimes - depends on the problem
Occasionally - if I'm interested in the topic
Not really - I prefer other activities

questions.text: How comfortable are you with learning new programming languages or technical tools?

choices.text: Very comfortable - I enjoy learning new tech
Somewhat comfortable - with proper guidance
Neutral - I can learn if needed
Uncomfortable - I prefer stable tools

questions.text: Do you like working with computers and digital systems?

choices.text: Absolutely - I'm always on my computer
Yes - I use computers daily for various tasks
Moderately - for basic tasks
Not particularly - I prefer offline activities

questions.text: How do you feel about working in teams on technical projects?

choices.text: Love it - collaboration makes projects better
Enjoy it - good for learning and sharing ideas
It's okay - depends on the team
Prefer working alone

questions.text: Are you interested in how technology impacts society and business?

choices.text: Very interested - I follow tech trends closely
Somewhat interested - I read about it occasionally
Mildly interested - basic awareness
Not interested - I focus on other areas

mappings.recommendation: Technology might not be the best fit for you right now. Consider exploring other fields that align better with your interests, such as arts, humanities, or social sciences.
You show some interest in technology. Consider starting with technology-adjacent fields or roles that combine tech with other interests.
You have a strong affinity for technology! Consider pursuing formal education in computer science, information technology, or related fields.

description: Explore if healthcare and helping others is your calling

questions.text: Do you feel fulfilled when helping others with their problems?

choices.text: Absolutely - it's very rewarding
Yes - I enjoy making a difference
Sometimes - depends on the situation
Not particularly - I prefer other activities

questions.text: How comfortable are you with medical or scientific concepts?

choices.text: Very comfortable - I find them fascinating
Comfortable - I can learn them well
Somewhat comfortable - with effort
Uncomfortable - they seem too complex

questions.text: Can you handle stressful situations and make quick decisions?

choices.text: Yes - I work well under pressure
Usually - I can manage stress effectively
Sometimes - depends on the situation
No - I prefer calm environments

questions.text: Are you comfortable with physical aspects of patient care?

choices.text: Very comfortable - doesn't bother me
Comfortable - I can adapt
Somewhat comfortable - with training
Uncomfortable - I'd prefer minimal contact

questions.text: Do you have strong communication and empathy skills?

choices.text: Yes - people often come to me for support
Good - I connect well with others
Average - I can improve with practice
Not my strength - I prefer technical work

mappings.recommendation: Healthcare may not be the ideal field for you. Consider exploring careers that better match your interests and strengths.
You show some interest in healthcare. Consider healthcare-adjacent roles or supportive positions in the medical field.
Healthcare seems like an excellent fit for you! Consider pursuing formal education in nursing, medicine, or allied health fields.

description: Discover if business, entrepreneurship, and finance match your interests

questions.text: Do you enjoy analyzing data and financial information?

choices.text: Love it - numbers tell great stories
Yes - I find patterns interesting
Sometimes - if it's relevant to me
Not really - I prefer other activities

questions.text: Are you interested in how businesses operate and make money?

choices.text: Very interested - I follow business news
Interested - I like learning about successful companies
Somewhat - basic curiosity
Not interested - I focus elsewhere

questions.text: Do you have leadership qualities and enjoy managing projects?

choices.text: Yes - I often take charge naturally
Usually - I can lead when needed
Sometimes - in familiar situations
No - I prefer to follow others

questions.text: Are you comfortable with risk-taking and uncertainty?

choices.text: Very comfortable - calculated risks excite me
Comfortable - with proper planning
Somewhat - depends on the stakes
Uncomfortable - I prefer stability

questions.text: Do you enjoy networking and building professional relationships?

choices.text: Love it - I'm naturally social
Enjoy it - good for career growth
It's okay - I can do it when needed
Don't enjoy it - I prefer working alone

mappings.recommendation: Business and finance might not align with your current interests. Consider exploring creative, technical, or service-oriented fields.
You show moderate interest in business. Consider business-adjacent roles or positions that combine business with other interests.
Business and finance appear to be excellent matches for you! Consider pursuing formal business education or entrepreneurship.

description: Explore if creative and artistic pursuits are your passion

questions.text: Do you enjoy creating visual art, designs, or other creative works?

choices.text: Absolutely - I create art regularly
Yes - I enjoy creative projects
Sometimes - when inspired
Not really - I prefer other activities

questions.text: Are you comfortable with subjective feedback and criticism of your work?

choices.text: Yes - feedback helps me improve
Usually - I can handle constructive criticism
Sometimes - depends on how it's delivered
No - I prefer objective evaluation

questions.text: Do you have a strong sense of aesthetics and visual composition?

choices.text: Yes - people often compliment my taste
Good - I notice design details
Average - I can learn with practice
Not particularly - I don't focus on visuals

questions.text: Are you willing to work irregular hours and handle project-based work?

choices.text: Yes - I prefer flexible schedules
Usually - I can adapt to project needs
Sometimes - depends on the project
No - I prefer regular 9-5 schedules

questions.text: Do you enjoy experimenting with new techniques and styles?

choices.text: Love it - I'm always trying new things
Yes - experimentation leads to growth
Sometimes - when I have time
Not really - I prefer proven methods

mappings.recommendation: Creative arts may not be the best fit for your current interests. Consider exploring more structured or analytical fields.
You show some creative potential. Consider careers that blend creativity with other skills or more structured creative roles.
Creative arts seem perfect for you! Consider pursuing formal art education or building a strong creative portfolio.

description: Discover your work and thinking style through a personality quiz.

questions.text: When working on a project, you prefer to:

choices.text: Work independently and set your own pace
Collaborate closely with team members
Lead the team and delegate tasks
Follow detailed instructions and guidelines

questions.text: In problem-solving situations, you typically:

choices.text: Analyze data and use logical reasoning
Brainstorm creative and innovative solutions
Seek input from others and build consensus
Make quick decisions based on intuition

questions.text: Your ideal work environment would be:

choices.text: A quiet office where you can focus deeply
An open space with lots of interaction
A dynamic environment with changing challenges
A structured setting with clear procedures

questions.text: When learning new skills, you prefer to:

choices.text: Read manuals and study theoretical concepts
Learn through hands-on practice and experimentation
Watch demonstrations and follow examples
Discuss concepts with mentors and peers

questions.text: Your approach to deadlines is typically:

choices.text: Plan ahead and complete tasks early
Work steadily and finish on time
Work best under pressure near the deadline
Break large tasks into smaller, manageable pieces

mappings.recommendation: You are a thoughtful and analytical person who values structure and planning.
You are creative and collaborative, thriving in dynamic and social settings.
You are a natural leader and innovator, excelling in fast-paced and challenging environments.

description: Find out which career fields match your interests.

questions.text: How interested are you in designing and building technological solutions?

choices.text: Very interested - I love creating tech solutions
Somewhat interested - I enjoy technical challenges
Moderately interested - It's okay but not my passion
Slightly interested - I prefer other activities
Not interested - Technology isn't appealing to me

questions.text: How interested are you in helping people with their health and medical needs?

choices.text: Very interested - I'm passionate about healthcare
Somewhat interested - I like helping people heal
Moderately interested - It's meaningful work
Slightly interested - I prefer other ways to help
Not interested - Medical field doesn't appeal to me

questions.text: How interested are you in managing finances, investments, or business operations?

choices.text: Very interested - I love business strategy and finance
Somewhat interested - Numbers and markets fascinate me
Moderately interested - It's practical and useful
Slightly interested - I prefer more creative work
Not interested - Business doesn't motivate me

questions.text: How interested are you in teaching, training, or developing others?

choices.text: Very interested - I love sharing knowledge and mentoring
Somewhat interested - I enjoy helping others learn
Moderately interested - Teaching can be rewarding
Slightly interested - I prefer learning to teaching
Not interested - Education field doesn't suit me

questions.text: How interested are you in creative expression through art, design, or media?

choices.text: Very interested - Creativity is my passion
Somewhat interested - I enjoy artistic pursuits
Moderately interested - Art is nice but not central
Slightly interested - I appreciate art but don't create
Not interested - Creative fields don't appeal to me

questions.text: How interested are you in conducting research and advancing scientific knowledge?

choices.text: Very interested - I love discovery and research
Somewhat interested - Science fascinates me
Moderately interested - Research can be engaging
Slightly interested - I prefer applied over theoretical
Not interested - Research doesn't motivate me

questions.text: How interested are you in addressing social issues and helping communities?

choices.text: Very interested - Social impact is my priority
Somewhat interested - I want to make a difference
Moderately interested - Helping others is important
Slightly interested - I prefer indirect ways to help
Not interested - Social work doesn't suit me

questions.text: How interested are you in legal systems, policy-making, or governance?

choices.text: Very interested - Law and policy fascinate me
Somewhat interested - I like debate and justice
Moderately interested - Legal work seems important
Slightly interested - I prefer less formal structures
Not interested - Legal field doesn't appeal to me

mappings.recommendation: You have a variety of interests. Explore different fields to find your passion.
You have clear interests in specific fields. Focus on developing skills in those areas.
You are highly passionate about your interests. Pursue leadership or innovation roles in your favorite field.

description: Evaluate your core professional and personal skills.

questions.text: How would you rate your ability to analyze complex problems and break them down into manageable parts?

choices.text: Expert - I excel at complex analysis and logical reasoning
Advanced - I'm very good at analytical thinking
Intermediate - I can handle moderate analytical tasks
Beginner - I'm developing my analytical skills
Novice - Analytical thinking is challenging for me

questions.text: How would you rate your ability to communicate ideas clearly and persuasively?

choices.text: Expert - I'm an excellent communicator in all formats
Advanced - I communicate very effectively
Intermediate - I can communicate adequately
Beginner - I'm working on my communication skills
Novice - Communication is difficult for me

questions.text: How would you rate your ability to lead teams and inspire others?

choices.text: Expert - I'm a natural leader who inspires others
Advanced - I lead effectively in most situations
Intermediate - I can lead when needed
Beginner - I'm developing leadership skills
Novice - Leadership doesn't come naturally to me

questions.text: How would you rate your technical and digital literacy skills?

choices.text: Expert - I master new technologies quickly
Advanced - I'm very comfortable with technology
Intermediate - I can handle standard tech tasks
Beginner - I'm learning technical skills
Novice - Technology is challenging for me

questions.text: How would you rate your ability to generate innovative ideas and creative solutions?

choices.text: Expert - I consistently generate innovative solutions
Advanced - I'm very creative and original
Intermediate - I can be creative when needed
Beginner - I'm developing my creative abilities
Novice - Creativity doesn't come easily to me

questions.text: How would you rate your ability to plan, organize, and execute projects?

choices.text: Expert - I excel at managing complex projects
Advanced - I'm very good at project organization
Intermediate - I can manage standard projects
Beginner - I'm learning project management
Novice - Project management is challenging for me

mappings.recommendation: You have a good foundation in key skills. Keep developing your abilities.
You are skilled in several areas. Consider specializing or taking on more responsibility.
You are highly skilled and ready for advanced roles. Aim for leadership or expert positions.
